translations: 适于居住的；可居住的，可栖居的

sentences.sentence: Most of the tropics, sub-tropics and even lower mid-latitudes are too hot to be inhabitable.
sentences.translation: 大多数的热带、亚热带地区甚至是更低的中纬度地区将由于太热而变得无法居住。

sentences.sentence: To counteract traffic noise an inhabitable double-skin façade similar to a loggia is created.
sentences.translation: 为了抵消交通噪音，该建筑创建了居住的双层立面和凉廊。

sentences.sentence: But with this approach, I am essentially explaining the design as a sculpture and not as an inhabitable structure.
sentences.translation: 但是，使用这种方法，我本质上是展现了一个雕塑，而不是一个可以居住的建筑。
